channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:08 Drive alarm to the Khmelnytsky region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:08 Drive alarm to the Khmelnytsky region. Watch for further messages.#Khmelnitskaya This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
